query:
SELECT 
                CAST(d.id as TEXT) as id, 
                d.title, 
                d.document_type as "document_type: _", 
                dl.link_order as "link_order?: i32"
            FROM 
                documents d
            JOIN 
                document_links dl ON d.id = dl.from_document_id
            WHERE 
                dl.to_document_id = ?
            ORDER BY 
                dl.link_order
